synopsis.text: Seven notorious criminals find themselves in an unexpected role as they are selected to replace the nearly decimated Shinsengumi police force during Japan's samurai era. With the city of Kyoto on the brink of chaos and the Masked Demons wreaking havoc, these former outlaws, led by Ichibanboshi, seek vengeance and redemption as they strive to restore peace and order. As they conceal their true identities, these unlikely heroes embark on a thrilling and dangerous journey to avenge their losses and protect the city from the looming threat. Will they succeed in upholding the law, or will their criminal pasts catch up with them? Join this extraordinary group of misfits as they rise to the challenge and become the unlikeliest of heroes.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
